titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the photograph series Demonstrations in Alexandria - 1921 AD.MC.050
titlestmt.author: Jasmine Soliman and Jonathan Burr for Akkasah: Photography Archive at NYUAD

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 19:04:56 +0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.abstract: Twenty photographs on four album pages, annotated in English, documenting the arrival of Saad Zaghloul in Alexandria on the 4th of April 1921 as well as the funerals of those killed by British troops on the 22nd and 23rd May 1921.

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: Twenty photographs on four album pages, annotated in English, documenting the arrival of Saad Zaghloul in Alexandria on the 4th of April 1921 as well as the funerals of those killed by British troops on the 22nd and 23rd May 1921.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: No information on the creator/photograph is known.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: NYU Abu Dhabi holds all copyright and related rights pertaining to this collection. Please contact Akkasah Photography Archive at akkasah@nyu.edu for information regarding information and use or submit an image request form via akkasah.org .

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Acquired from a private seller based in Worcestershire, UK on 23 July 2018.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Syria Collection; AD_MC_036; box number; folder number or item identifier; Akkasah Photography Archive, al Mawrid, New York University Abu Dhabi.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Materials were placed in new acid-free sleeves. Original caption information, when available, will be transcribed into ArchivesSpace. The language of the original captions was retained in the digitisation of the backing paper.
